data.eml:eml: A new species of Fidelia Friese, 1899 (Hymenoptera, Megachilidae), with a key to the species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jessica R. Litman, Connal D. Eardley, Michael Kuhlmann (2016): A new species of Fidelia Friese, 1899 (Hymenoptera, Megachilidae), with a key to the species of the genus. European Journal of Taxonomy 174: 1-18, DOI: 10.5852/ejt.2016.174
